attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No adjustmets.additions,alterations to the current E. U. constitution without a referendum BY and for the citizens of U.K. If as seems very likely that the PM will ignore the electorate,I and millions like me will use our vote in the general election to oust Labour

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
